verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: حم
verses.verseStringB: Ha. Meem.

verses.verseString: وَالْكِتَابِ الْمُبِينِ
verses.verseStringB: By the Enlightening Scripture.

verses.verseString: إِنَّا أَنْزَلْنَاهُ فِي لَيْلَةٍ مُبَارَكَةٍ ۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُنْذِرِينَ
verses.verseStringB: We revealed it on a Blessed Night—We have been warning.

verses.verseString: فِيهَا يُفْرَقُ كُلُّ أَمْرٍ حَكِيمٍ
verses.verseStringB: In it, every wise command is made distinct.

verses.verseString: أَمْرًا مِنْ عِنْدِنَا ۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُرْسِلِينَ
verses.verseStringB: A command from Us. We have been sending messages.

verses.verseString: رَحْمَةً مِنْ رَبِّكَ ۚ إِنَّهُ هُوَ السَّمِيعُ الْعَلِيمُ
verses.verseStringB: As mercy from your Lord. He is the Hearer, the Knower.

verses.verseString: رَبِّ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ۖ إِنْ كُنْتُمْ مُوقِنِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Lord of the heavens and the earth and everything between them, if you are certain.

verses.verseString: لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ يُحْيِي وَيُمِيتُ ۖ رَبُّكُمْ وَرَبُّ آبَائِكُمُ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.verseStringB: There is no god except He. He gives life, and He causes death. Your Lord and Lord of your earliest ancestors.

verses.verseString: بَلْ هُمْ فِي شَكٍّ يَلْعَبُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Yet they play around in doubt.

verses.verseString: فَارْتَقِبْ يَوْمَ تَأْتِي السَّمَاءُ بِدُخَانٍ مُبِينٍ
verses.verseStringB: So watch for the Day when the sky produces a visible smoke.

verses.verseString: يَغْشَى النَّاسَ ۖ هَٰذَا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
verses.verseStringB: Enveloping humanity. This is a painful punishment.

verses.verseString: رَبَّنَا اكْشِفْ عَنَّا الْعَذَابَ إِنَّا مُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.verseStringB: “Our Lord, lift the suffering from us, we are believers.”

verses.verseString: أَنَّىٰ لَهُمُ الذِّكْرَىٰ وَقَدْ جَاءَهُمْ رَسُولٌ مُبِينٌ
verses.verseStringB: How can there be a reminder for them, and an enlightening messenger has come to them.

verses.verseString: ثُمَّ تَوَلَّوْا عَنْهُ وَقَالُوا مُعَلَّمٌ مَجْنُونٌ
verses.verseStringB: But they turned away from him, and said, “Educated, but crazy.”

verses.verseString: إِنَّا كَاشِفُو الْعَذَابِ قَلِيلًا ۚ إِنَّكُمْ عَائِدُونَ
verses.verseStringB: We will postpone the punishment for a while, but you will return.

verses.verseString: يَوْمَ نَبْطِشُ الْبَطْشَةَ الْكُبْرَىٰ إِنَّا مُنْتَقِمُونَ
verses.verseStringB: On the Day when We launch the Great Assault—We will avenge.

verses.verseString: وَلَقَدْ فَتَنَّا قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمَ فِرْعَوْنَ وَجَاءَهُمْ رَسُولٌ كَرِيمٌ
verses.verseStringB: We tested the people of Pharaoh before them: a noble messenger came to them.

verses.verseString: أَنْ أَدُّوا إِلَيَّ عِبَادَ اللَّهِ ۖ إِنِّي لَكُمْ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٌ
verses.verseStringB: “Hand over the servants of Allah to me. I am a trustworthy messenger to you.”

verses.verseString: وَأَنْ لَا تَعْلُوا عَلَى اللَّهِ ۖ إِنِّي آتِيكُمْ بِسُلْطَانٍ مُبِينٍ
verses.verseStringB: And, “Do not exalt yourselves above Allah. I come to you with clear authority.

verses.verseString: وَإِنِّي عُذْتُ بِرَبِّي وَرَبِّكُمْ أَنْ تَرْجُمُونِ
verses.verseStringB: And I have sought refuge in my Lord and your Lord, lest you condemn me.

verses.verseString: وَإِنْ لَمْ تُؤْمِنُوا لِي فَاعْتَزِلُونِ
verses.verseStringB: But if you do not believe in me, then keep away from me.”

verses.verseString: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُ أَنَّ هَٰؤُلَاءِ قَوْمٌ مُجْرِمُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Then he then appealed to his Lord: “These are guilty people.”

verses.verseString: فَأَسْرِ بِعِبَادِي لَيْلًا إِنَّكُمْ مُتَّبَعُونَ
verses.verseStringB: “Set out with My servants by night—you will be followed.

verses.verseString: وَاتْرُكِ الْبَحْرَ رَهْوًا ۖ إِنَّهُمْ جُنْدٌ مُغْرَقُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And cross the sea quickly—they are an army to be drowned.”

verses.verseString: كَمْ تَرَكُوا مِنْ جَنَّاتٍ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.verseStringB: How many gardens and fountains did they leave behind?

verses.verseString: وَزُرُوعٍ وَمَقَامٍ كَرِيمٍ
verses.verseStringB: And plantations, and splendid residences.

verses.verseString: وَنَعْمَةٍ كَانُوا فِيهَا فَاكِهِينَ
verses.verseStringB: And luxuries they used to enjoy.

verses.verseString: كَذَٰلِكَ ۖ وَأَوْرَثْنَاهَا قَوْمًا آخَرِينَ
verses.verseStringB: So it was. And We passed it on to another people.

verses.verseString: فَمَا بَكَتْ عَلَيْهِمُ السَّمَاءُ وَالْأَرْضُ وَمَا كَانُوا مُنْظَرِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Neither heaven nor earth wept over them, nor were they delayed.

verses.verseString: وَلَقَدْ نَجَّيْنَا بَنِي إِسْرَائِيلَ مِنَ الْعَذَابِ الْمُهِينِ
verses.verseStringB: And We saved the Children of Israel from the humiliating persecution.

verses.verseString: مِنْ فِرْعَوْنَ ۚ إِنَّهُ كَانَ عَالِيًا مِنَ الْمُسْرِفِينَ
verses.verseStringB: From Pharaoh. He was a tyrant, a transgressor.

verses.verseString: وَلَقَدِ اخْتَرْنَاهُمْ عَلَىٰ عِلْمٍ عَلَى الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.verseStringB: And We chose them knowingly over all people.

verses.verseString: وَآتَيْنَاهُمْ مِنَ الْآيَاتِ مَا فِيهِ بَلَاءٌ مُبِينٌ
verses.verseStringB: And We gave them many signs in which was an obvious trial.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ هَٰؤُلَاءِ لَيَقُولُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Yet these say:

verses.verseString: إِنْ هِيَ إِلَّا مَوْتَتُنَا الْأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمُنْشَرِينَ
verses.verseStringB: “There is nothing beyond our first death, and we will not be resurrected.

verses.verseString: فَأْتُوا بِآبَائِنَا إِنْ كُنْتُمْ صَادِقِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Bring back our ancestors, if you are truthful.”

verses.verseString: أَهُمْ خَيْرٌ أَمْ قَوْمُ تُبَّعٍ وَالَّذِينَ مِنْ قَبْلِهِمْ ۚ أَهْلَكْنَاهُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا مُجْرِمِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Are they better, or the people of Tubba and those before them? We annihilated them. They were guilty.

verses.verseString: وَمَا خَلَقْنَا السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا لَاعِبِينَ
verses.verseStringB: We did not create the heavens and the earth and what is between them in play.

verses.verseString: مَا خَلَقْنَاهُمَا إِلَّا بِالْحَقِّ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.verseStringB: We only created them for a purpose, but most of them do not know.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ يَوْمَ الْفَصْلِ مِيقَاتُهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.verseStringB: The Day of Sorting Out is the time appointed for all.

verses.verseString: يَوْمَ لَا يُغْنِي مَوْلًى عَنْ مَوْلًى شَيْئًا وَلَا هُمْ يُنْصَرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: The Day when no friend will avail a friend in any way, and they will not be helped.

verses.verseString: إِلَّا مَنْ رَحِمَ اللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّهُ هُوَ الْعَزِيزُ الرَّحِيمُ
verses.verseStringB: Except those on whom Allah has mercy. He is the Powerful, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ شَجَرَتَ الزَّقُّومِ
verses.verseStringB: The Tree of Bitterness.

verses.verseString: طَعَامُ الْأَثِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: The food of the sinful.

verses.verseString: كَالْمُهْلِ يَغْلِي فِي الْبُطُونِ
verses.verseStringB: Like molten lead—boiling inside the bellies.

verses.verseString: كَغَلْيِ الْحَمِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: Like the boiling of seething water.

verses.verseString: خُذُوهُ فَاعْتِلُوهُ إِلَىٰ سَوَاءِ الْجَحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: Seize him and drag him into the depths of Hell.

verses.verseString: ثُمَّ صُبُّوا فَوْقَ رَأْسِهِ مِنْ عَذَابِ الْحَمِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: Then pour over his head the suffering of the Inferno.

verses.verseString: ذُقْ إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ الْعَزِيزُ الْكَرِيمُ
verses.verseStringB: Taste! You who were powerful and noble.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ هَٰذَا مَا كُنْتُمْ بِهِ تَمْتَرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: This is what you used to doubt.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ الْمُتَّقِينَ فِي مَقَامٍ أَمِينٍ
verses.verseStringB: But the righteous will be in a secure place.

verses.verseString: فِي جَنَّاتٍ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.verseStringB: Amid Gardens and springs.

verses.verseString: يَلْبَسُونَ مِنْ سُنْدُسٍ وَإِسْتَبْرَقٍ مُتَقَابِلِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Dressed in fine silk and rich brocade, facing one another.

verses.verseString: كَذَٰلِكَ وَزَوَّجْنَاهُمْ بِحُورٍ عِينٍ
verses.verseStringB: So it will be. And We will pair them with lovely companions.

verses.verseString: يَدْعُونَ فِيهَا بِكُلِّ فَاكِهَةٍ آمِنِينَ
verses.verseStringB: In it, they call for every fruit, in serenity.

verses.verseString: لَا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا الْمَوْتَ إِلَّا الْمَوْتَةَ الْأُولَىٰ ۖ وَوَقَاهُمْ عَذَابَ الْجَحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: They will taste no death in it, except the first death. And He will protect them from the suffering of the Blaze.

verses.verseString: فَضْلًا مِنْ رَبِّكَ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ الْفَوْزُ الْعَظِيمُ
verses.verseStringB: A grace from your Lord. That is the ultimate success.

verses.verseString: فَإِنَّمَا يَسَّرْنَاهُ بِلِسَانِكَ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: We made it easy in your language, so that they may remember.

verses.verseString: فَارْتَقِبْ إِنَّهُمْ مُرْتَقِبُونَ
verses.verseStringB: So be on the watch. They too are on the watch.
